alert.headline: NWS Cleveland (Northern Ohio)
alert.desc:
...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS
AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EDT SUNDAY...
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 knots and waves 2 to 4 feet
expected.
* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Maumee Bay to
The Islands OH.
* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EDT Sunday.
* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

alert.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS
alert.areas: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service
alert.desc:
...Below freezing temperatures tonight could harm fragile plants...
With temperatures falling to between 25 and 30 degrees tonight and
the potential for frost, those with fragile flowers and plants
that are susceptible will want to consider taking steps to protect
them. This includes taking potted plants inside or covering
plants that are in the ground.
